citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 am on
22-May-18.
Spoke with representative at site. Owner would not be home for 2 more days.
Additional Inspectors
Moore Joshua, Compliance Specialist
